The Cybrats aren't interested in the secret launch site, they're just after
free weapons and energeon by beating up drunken and damaged bots, they had
no idea that this had anything to do with the Autobot military or they
would've expected reinforcements and never had attacked to begin with.
----- Original Message -----
From: rAuq <rauq@...>
To: <nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com>
Sent: Monday, May 28, 2001 9:58 PM
Subject: Re: The bum and the hole....


> OOC: lol, the Cybrats are sort of out numbered, and out gunned..
> Especially since Pacifix arrived. (and I started posting again for my
> characters that were already there). =P I will say that I disagree
> with the Cybrats being able to find the Autobot hidden launch site
> so easily, or smell its fuel for that matter, it was supposed to be
> top secret. =|
>
> OOC2: Jordan, since Icedemon has decided to part with the rpg,
> that means that one of your characters will end up as second in
> command. I suggest Crotale, and he would come in after the
> Autobots crash on the planet, if they ever launch. *kidney shot to
> CyberwolF* =P
>
> On 29 May 2001, at 0:33, CYBERWOLF4 wrote:
>
> > Don't worry R the Cybrats are street punks on Cybertron, they'll
> > either be dead (I didn't expect a fight with the Dinobots) or crawl
> > back into thier hole either with thier prize or to lick thier wounds.
> > (If I would've thought about it sooner I would've changed the name but
> > I threw them in on the spur of the moment.)
